##Step 1 Load dataset
```{r}
rm(list=ls())
df <- read.csv(file = "./carteggiosvevo3.csv",sep = ";")
head(df)
install.packages("tm")
install.packages("SnowballC")
library(tm)
```

##Step 2 Data Preprocessing
```{r}
letter1 <- df[1,"text"]
letter1
tokenized <- Boost_tokenizer(letter1)
lowercase <- tolower(tokenized)
noPunctuation <- removePunctuation(lowercase)
nonumbers <- removeNumbers(noPunctuation)
noSpaces <- stripWhitespace(nonumbers)
new_stops <- c(stopwords("en"),stopwords("german"),stopwords("italian"))
letterResult <-removeWords(noSpaces, new_stops)
letterResult

#Stemming procedure
stemmed <- stemDocument(letterResult)
stemmed
```
